pr_title: Persist last active tab on start up

timeline.message: fix issue where selected tab on startup was being overwritten, persist active column

timeline.body: IMHO, a more idiomatic way of specifying this is JavaScript would be `this.activeColumn || ""`.
timeline.bodyText: IMHO, a more idiomatic way of specifying this is JavaScript would be this.activeColumn || "".
timeline.bodyHTML: IMHO, a more idiomatic way of specifying this is JavaScript would be this.activeColumn || "".
timeline.author: kevinushey

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
determine next tab and select on F6
add setFocus() call to WorkbenchTab so every tab can be focused
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio into feature/cycle-panes
focus column on F6
always put main source column at beginning of list
display source columns within their logical windows rather than directly in the source pane
fix issues with source navigation buttons
initiate SourceColumnManager with the main source column as the active column
Merge pull request #7422 from rstudio/bugfix/source-back-forward
Merge branches 'feature/cycle-panes' and 'master' of https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio into feature/cycle-panes
do not attempt to display source columns before they are ready. Make sure columns are always added to the left of the view and end of the manager's list.
implement Shift+F6 to navigate to previous pane
clean up typos
fix focus/selection bug for visual editor that occurred when exiting find in files dialog
Merge pull request #7463 from rstudio/feature/previous-pane
focus splitter for source columns
Prevent access to invisible columns (#7476)
implement custom return focus behavior for Source pane elements
remove accidental import
use ClassIds helper class
rename
Merge pull request #7479 from rstudio/bugfix/modal-dialogs-focus-handlers
Revert "fix focus/selection bug for visual editor that occurred when exiting find in files dialog"
columns will be unattached prior to their documents being restored so we shouldn't reset the active column
Merge pull request #7481 from rstudio/feature/resize-column-splitter
when rstudioapi::navigateToFile is called without a file, scroll to the line in the currently open file
implement moveCursor flag on rstudioapi::navigateToFile. Replace navigateToFileWithoutFocus by adding a boolean to the already existing navigateToFile call.
do not open a new source doc before showing the main source window
open new doc when main source is made visible after start up
properly count how many docs a column is opening with
do not save clean documents when the user requests to close a tab.
prevent lambda type exception on startup
Merge pull request #7617 from rstudio/bugfix/no-new-doc-for-main
when the active source column is closed, make the main column the active column
set the active column before executing any text editor toolbar commands in case this isn't our current active column
eliminate eclipse warnings
process columns one-by-one
implement simple selection-based transformations for visual mode (#7738)
whitespace cleanup
send focus to console after closing all tabs (#7811)
Provide meaningful name for source column landmarks and min/max buttons
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into bugfix/source-column-landmark-names
set active editor after doc closed
add explicit document open API (#7837)
prevent excessive set_client_state calls
add command to open source doc in new column
disable and hide multiple source column commands when `Allow Source Columns` is off.
don't adjust command when source column max is reached
reset active editor before closing all other source docs (#8095)
prevent exception with Close All (#8109)
consolidate disownDoc functions so they both reset the active editor
Use modal return focus handlers in ModalPopupPanel
update save commands on window focus
Fix Close All Except Current with unsaved files (#8311)
add context-menu to document tabs
if files are moves to the main source pane, ensure it is visible
Merge branch 'v1.4-juliet-rose' into feature/doc-tab-context-menu
fix vim close-all command
eliminate excludeActive flag and just use excludeDocId
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/v1.4-juliet-rose' into feature/doc-tab-context-menu
provide an internal API for closing all source tabs without saving
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into v1.4-juliet-rose
fix closeAllSourceBuffersWithoutSaving to silently close modified unsaved files (#8440)
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into v1.4-juliet-rose
fixup code after merging master to v1.4-juliet-rose
refactor palette entry providers
bulk update copyright dates to 2021
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into v1.4-juliet-rose
mechanical refactor, replace explicit type with <>
refactor final batch of events to single-file model
ensure Close of modified file via context menu prompts to save
fix issue with close all other context menu closing everything
remove unnecessary check of activeColumn_
initial work on qmd
remove qmd render work
qmd file type
new quarto doc command
scaffold new qmd command
Fix for inability to run shiny interative docs from server.R
Add commands to open selected files in columns or active editor
respect editor mode preference in quarto project/document yaml
visual editor option for new quarto project
Merge pull request #9834 from rstudio/feature/open-files-in-columns
separate command for new quarto pres
use standard document templates for new quarto doc/pres
initial work on templates; move quarto commands to their own source file
feat(i18n) workbench-views-source
fix(address review requests
fix(i18n): clean-up few literals and i18n-ify missed literals
bump copyright to 2022
`.rs.api.documentOpen()` scrolls into view (#10545)
allow request for editor context by id (#10872)
more string updates
use standard loop so that early return actually returns (#11501)
Live updates for object explorer (#11781)
Update copyright to Posit
Posit Software PBC
switch from data viewer and object  explorer viewer if object type changes (#11910)
Merge pull request #11765 from rstudio/feature/rebrand_company_name
more rebranding copyright update
glimpse for `COLUMN` and `DATAFRAME` completion popups (#12309)
